long_description: The stories behind historic Oregon places you can walk to, from wagon ruts of the Oregon Trail to coastal viewpoints of the Lewis and Clark expedition. Author: William Sullivan. Softcover; 196 pages; 116 black-and-white photos, 58 maps. Navillus Press; copyright 1999. Tells the story behind 56 of the state's most scenic historic places.
short_description: The stories behind historic Oregon places you can walk to, from wagon ruts of the Oregon Trail to coastal viewpoints of the Lewis and Clark expedition.
